name: DemoniZed.WAD   a BOOM only PWAD
description: 2 Levels only for the Team TNT 's engine modification: BOOM v. 2.02 DO NOT TRY run with original DOOM2.exe it will crash!! Map01 is MEGA-HUGE-EVIL LEVEL! This level alone is around 1.6 MB big, loaded with 15000+ linedefs and 21000+ sidedefs. This is a TOTAL CARNAGE. Level 2 is action all the time. Your goal is simply: SURVIVE AND KILL!
